attributes.action: Extend the deadline EU Settlement Scheme (settled and pre-settled status)
attributes.additional_details: Do to covid 19/some people have id or passports expired or they don't have any form for id's for their kids as Consulates and Embassies was closed or people had restrictions to travel to their embassy they could not leave their town
attributes.background: I want the parliament to extend the deadline for the EU settlement Scheme with at least 2 years

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565978
